title: На Байкал. Поехали
overview: The characters of the film return home after a vacation on Baikal, to their everyday life, during which each of them faces their own problems. Valya returns to St. Petersburg to defend her diploma thesis, Stepa is fired from his job, Bulat, an eternal student, is transferred to a commercial form of education... Each episode is a separate story with its own unique character!
